summary: This document is an email chain from September 30, 2021, regarding a request to AT&T to certify a telephone record from August 23, 2006. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is making the request as part of an investigation, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to evidence collection.

persons.name: Abel
persons.context: Mentioned as the contact at AT&T's court center who informed the sender that the email request would generate a ticket for their tech people to search for a record.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the certification request to AT&T for a record dated August 23, 2006, from the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: The prosecutor communicated with Abel at AT&T's court center regarding the process for certifying a telephone record.

events.title: Certification Request to AT&T
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a request to AT&T to certify an attached telephone record from 2006, following a call with an AT&T representative named Abel.

events.title: Creation of AT&T Record
events.description: The AT&T record in question, with file code 229703, was created on this date.

keyFacts: A prosecutor from the Southern District of New York is actively seeking to certify an AT&T telephone record from August 23, 2006, as of September 2021.
The record has a specific file code: 229703.
The communication indicates the use of standard legal evidence-gathering procedures, involving direct contact with a telecom company's court center.
The email suggests the investigation was ongoing years after the original record date.
